sections.heading: Nonliability3-3119.NonliabilityNotwithstanding any law to the contrary, neither the director nor his authorized representative is subject to civil liability for any acts or omissions in the course of any inspection or investigation for the department if he is acting in a reasonable manner, consideri
sections.text: Nonliability3-3119.NonliabilityNotwithstanding any law to the contrary, neither the director nor his authorized representative is subject to civil liability for any acts or omissions in the course of any inspection or investigation for the department if he is acting in a reasonable manner, considering the activity in which he is engaged.
